com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.validation

Class AbstractWFieldIndicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractWComponent
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.validation.AbstractWFieldIndicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WComponent, WebComponent, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WFieldErrorIndicator, WFieldWarningIndicator

    public abstract class AbstractWFieldIndicator
extends AbstractWComponent
    A component to display a warning/error (or other) message that can be associated with an input field.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    9/10/2009
    Author:
    Darian Bridge
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getOrCreateComponentModel

        protected AbstractWFieldIndicator.FieldIndicatorModel getOrCreateComponentModel()
        Description copied from class: AbstractWComponent
        Retrieves the model for this component so that it can be modified. If this method is called during request processing, and a session specific model does not yet exist, then a new model is created. Subclasses may override this method to narrow the return type to their specific model type.
        Overrides:
        getOrCreateComponentModel in class AbstractWComponent
        Returns:
        The FieldIndicatorModel.
